text: Arteshbod Abbas Gharabaghi (; 1 November 1918 – 14 October 2000) was the last chief of staff of the Iranian armed forces, as well as deputy commander-in- chief of the Iranian Imperial Army. ==Death== Gharabaghi died in Paris in 2000. He was buried in Père Lachaise Cemetery. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1918 births Category:2000 deaths Category:Burials at Père Lachaise Cemetery Category:Iranian generals Category:Iranian politicians
title: Abbas Gharabaghi
